TopicTitle: Excellent documentary on the Rosetta Mission background on pbs.org

Articles.Content:
PBS (public television in the US) is doing a documentary on the Rosetta mission. The final version will air on local stations and online next Wednesday but an hour long preview is available now with lots of interesting details about the mission. It covers the initial planning and launch through rendezvous and the selection of the final landing site. Lots of interesting details, especially for us KSP fans.

http://video.pbs.org/video/2365367186/
Any other place where we can watch it? It is restricted for US.
